ComicInfo.Penciller: James Fry III,Jim Fern,Steve Ditko,Dave Ross,Jim Fry,Dave Ross,Jim Fry,Jim Fern,Steve Ditko
ComicInfo.Summary:
Wolverine saves a man from being mauled by a bear but doesn't recognize Bruce Banner in his daytime guise. He certainly recognizes him later when he encounters him as the Hulk.
Jack locks himself into the howling room to ride out his stint as the Werewolf little knowing that he is being stalked by the Silver Dagger.
Tiger Shark takes down Stingray and makes off with his wife.
ComicInfo.Tags: North Carolina,Florida,Mimic,Los Angeles,Wolverine,Cult of Kali,Hulk,Werewolf By Night,Tiger Shark,Shroud,Silver Dagger,On the Road,Stingray,Diane Newell,Michael O'Brien
ComicInfo.Title: On the Road with Wolverine and the Hulk, Part 1: The Long and Winding Road; Children of the Beast Chapter 1: The Moon Is a Harsh Mistress; Family Matters, Part 2: Confrontation; The Dark Light of Kali
